description: A comprehensive medical record document containing patient information, clinical findings, diagnoses, treatments, and healthcare provider notes for medical care documentation and analysis.

patient_name.instruction: Extract patient full name as it appears in the medical record

date_of_birth.instruction: Extract patient date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format

medical_record_number.instruction: Extract medical record number (MRN) or patient identifier

diagnoses.instruction: Extract medical diagnoses with ICD codes if present

medications.instruction: Extract current medications with dosages and frequencies

allergies.instruction: Extract known allergies and adverse reactions

heart_rate.instruction: Extract heart rate in beats per minute

symptoms.instruction: Extract patient reported symptoms and complaints

treatment_plan.instruction: Extract recommended treatment plan and next steps

visit_date.instruction: Extract date of medical visit in YYYY-MM-DD format

provider_name.instruction: Extract healthcare provider or physician name
